text: Schiavo () is an Italian surname and may refer to: *Maria Grazia Schiavo, Italian operatic soprano *Mary Schiavo, former Inspector General of the United States Department of Transportation *Samy Schiavo, French mixed martial artist *Tomaso Schiavo, Venetian captain *Terri Schiavo case, surrounding the woman whose medical condition garnered much media attention **The much-publicized Schiavo memo ==See also== *Schiavone
title: Schiavo
